mapper.sql: FROM sys_menu WHERE 1=1 AND destroyed = FALSE order by sno
mapper.select: SELECT id,pid,sno,text,coded,permission,types,attributes,url,icon_cls,can_use,state, create_name,create_time,modify_name,modify_time FROM sys_menu WHERE 1=1 AND id = #{id} AND destroyed = FALSE

SELECT sys_menu.id,sys_menu.pid,sys_menu.text, IFNULL(sys_permissions.role_id,#{roleId}) as role_id,sys_menu.types, sys_menu.icon_cls,IF (ISNULL(sys_permissions.menu_id),0,1) AS checked FROM sys_menu LEFT JOIN sys_permissions ON (sys_menu.id = sys_permissions.menu_id AND sys_permissions.role_id = #{roleId}) WHERE sys_menu.pid = #{pid} AND sys_menu.destroyed = FALSE
SELECT id,pid,sno,text,coded,permission,types,attributes,url,icon_cls,can_use, create_name,create_time,modify_name,modify_time FROM sys_menu WHERE 1=1 AND pid = #{pid} AND destroyed = FALSE
